text_block_list.text:
As a new trainer, I was extremely busy but I had 
decided to take a day off. I was completely exhausted 
while taking a walk when I noticed something――

I rushed down to the riverside. An Uma Musume was laying 
there with her eyes closed. Maybe she was feeling sick……!?

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Eh, ah……no! I'm totally fine. 
I was just sunbathing~……

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Mmmmm~~……sorry for confusing you. 
Ehehe, thanks for worrying about me.
choice_data_list: No, I'm glad it was nothing serious

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, rather I feel fully recharged! I was 
able to bask in the sun for so long, my body's 
all warmed up, and all that exhaustion――

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right. 
If you want, how about you try it too? Sunbathing.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Fufufuu, sorry for asking that. But, it just seemed like, 
judging by your face……that maybe you were really tired.

That's true, lately I've been working almost non-stop…… 
just laying in the sun like that might feel really nice.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
If you lay down and take it easy, you'll feel better. 
Now, now, if you'd like, just for a little bit.

And so, I laid in the soft grass beside her. 
The sunlight was warm and felt nice……

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Howaaa……it's so warm, huh~……

I woke up a short while later. 
My whole body felt warm and refreshed.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Upsy-daisy! Onii-san, how was it? 
……Fufuu, looks like you're feeling a lot better!
choice_data_list: I guess I was really tired……!

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Upsy-daisy! Onee-san, how was it? 
……Fufuu, looks like you're feeling a lot better!
choice_data_list: I guess I was really tired……!

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
After relaxing for a bit, if you take a short 
walk you'll feel even better! After some 
sunbathing I usually wander around over there.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: If you have time, how about joining me?

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
There are always a bunch of families here so it's always lively. 
Fufuu, there are so many kids around, they're all so cute~.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it? 
It almost feels like they're giving me energy……Hm?

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Wah! It's a kitty. Looks like it's used to being around people. 
Fufufu, nyaan nyan. Do you want to walk with us?

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: ……Hm? What? Where are you going?

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Wah, so pretty……! I didn't know there was a path like this. 
Kitty, did you want to show us this? ……Oh, it's not here.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa, I guess so. 
I guess I'll have to thank it next time.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
But, it's really wide open here. Maybe we should walk a 
lap and look……Wah, over there, there's alot of big flowers~!

And like that, we took our time wandering around……before I 
realized it, because of her, I was feeling fully refreshed.

text_block_list.name: Carefree Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Haa, that was alot of fun, wasn't it!? I――ah, now that 
I think about it, I haven't introduced myself yet.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm Rhein Kraft! 
And you're……wait, huh? That badge……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I-I just realized it, but……! Are you a trainer at the academy? 
I'm also a student at Tracen Academy~!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I haven't debuted yet so I guess it's not 
surprising you didn't know. Besides, at school there's 
already lots of other flashy more famous Uma Musume~.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Like Mejiro Ramonu-san and Air Groove-san…… 
Have you ever seen one of their races? They're 
both strong, beautiful, and stunning!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Nishino Flower-san's 『Oka Sho』 and Mejiro Dober's 『Oaks』 
and 『Shuuka Sho』! I can't help but admire their running……!

All the Uma Musume she was talking about with a sparkle in 
her eyes, were all participating in the Triple Tiara rotation.
choice_data_list: You really like Tiara Uma Musume
You really like Tiara Uma Musume

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
They're all so beautiful and dignified! It's like 
a dream that I can go to the same school as them…… 
I can't help but get excited when I walk by them~!
choice_data_list: You're aiming for the Tiara too?
You're aiming for the Tiara too?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Of course! I want to get stronger and 
shine just like my senpais. And then――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
In the 『Oka Sho』 『Oaks』 and 『Shuuka Sho』 I'll win! 
I'll earn the title of "Triple Tiara"!

It's not something easy to do――only two others had done it 
in history. Accomplishing that would be quite the feat.

One could say her aspiration was childish and 
wasn't grounded in reality at all, however――

Having a big dream wasn't a bad thing. For these girls that 
ran for the tiara, that may even be the most important thing.
choice_data_list: I hope you can get the Triple Tiara
I hope you can get the Triple Tiara

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, thank you very much!! 
Alright, I'll show you I can do it!!

She was so bright it was almost blinding…… 
A few days after that――

A mock race was held that was open to the public……among the 
Uma Musume running on the course was a familiar face.
――And she definitely had an amazing run

The first thing that caught my eye was her 
outstanding start. It was clean and she quickly 
took a good position――it was overwhelming.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Her concentration at the start and her positioning are 
both top notch. Rhein Kraft has quite the talent……!

Her pacing was also good. She continued to maintain 
a good position all the way to the end――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Now! Fuu--Haaaaaaaaa!!

She pulled ahead quickly and reached a high speed―― 
Her strength was on another level and her result 
was an astounding victory by 5 lengths……!
choice_data_list: So this is how she runs……!?
So this is how she runs……!?

text_block_list.text:
I clutch at my chest. ……it was beyond just calling 
this a childish admiration. Rhein Kraft was 
someone who possessed a tremendous talent――!
